member.name: T:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskHelpers
member.summary: Helpers for awaiting Tasks.
member.remarks: These helpers may also be useful for other langauges that do not support the await keyword.

member.name: M:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskHelpers.Await(System.Threading.Tasks.Task,System.Action)
member.param: The task to await.
The code to execute once the task finishes successfully.
member.summary: Await the given task using the given functions.
member.returns: A new task representing the await.

member.name: M:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskHelpers.Await(System.Threading.Tasks.Task,System.Action,System.Action)
member.param: The task to await.
The code to execute once the task finishes successfully.
The code to execute after the await is ready regardless of the task's success/failure.
member.summary: Await the given task using the given functions.
member.returns: A new task representing the await.

member.name: M:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskHelpers.Await(System.Threading.Tasks.Task,System.Action,System.Action{System.Exception})
member.param: The task to await.
The code to execute once the task finishes successfully.
The code to execute if the task or the code that executes after it terminate with exceptions.
member.summary: Await the given task using the given functions.
member.returns: A new task representing the await.

member.name: M:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskHelpers.Await(System.Threading.Tasks.Task,System.Action,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: The task to await.
The code to execute once the task finishes successfully.
The cancellation token to use if the awaiting happens asynchronously.
member.summary: Await the given task using the given functions.
member.returns: A new task representing the await.

member.name: M:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskHelpers.Await(System.Threading.Tasks.Task,System.Action,System.Action,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: The task to await.
The code to execute once the task finishes successfully.
The code to execute after the await is ready regardless of the task's success/failure.
The cancellation token to use if the awaiting happens asynchronously.
member.summary: Await the given task using the given functions.
member.returns: A new task representing the await.

member.param: The task to await.

The code to execute if the task or the code that executes after it terminate with exceptions.
The code to execute after the await is ready regardless of the task's success/failure.
member.summary: Await the given task using the given functions.
member.returns: A new task representing the await.

member.name: M:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskHelpers.Completed
member.summary: Returns a completed task that has no result.
member.returns: An already compelete Task.

member.name: M:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskHelpers.FromError(System.Exception)
member.param: The exception to package into a Task.
member.summary: Returns an error task. The task is Completed, IsCanceled = False, IsFaulted = True.
member.returns: A completed faulted Task with the specified error set.

member.name: M:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskHelpers.FromError``1(System.Exception)
member.typeparam: The exception to package into a Task.
member.param: The exception to package into a Task<TResult>.
member.summary: Returns an error task of the given type. The task is Completed, IsCanceled = False, IsFaulted = True.
member.returns: A completed faulted Task<TResult> with the specified error set.

member.name: M:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskHelpers.NullResult
member.summary: Returns a Task with a null result.
member.returns: A Task<object> with null as the result.
